definition: to feel vexed/to bother/to trouble/superfluous and confusing/edgy
to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request

sentences.english: Could you provide us with the requisite financial information so that we can open your new account immediately?
sentences.chinese: 烦请提供有关的财务资料，以能立即开立账户。

sentences.english: Kindly inform us when this is put into effect.
sentences.chinese: 在本项目实行之际，烦请通知我们一声。

sentences.english: Will you mark on it the quantity you want and mail it tonight?
sentences.chinese: 烦请在该单上注明所需数量，并请于今夜寄回。

sentences.english: But can we mix sizes of wheeel weights in this 2 tons or no?
sentences.chinese: 烦请告知我们这2吨是否可以由不同型号的产品混装？

sentences.english: Payment should be made by irrevocable and confirmed letter of credit.
sentences.chinese: 款项烦请以不可撤销保兑之信用状支付。

sentences.english: Please kindly PM me with your bids and track records.
sentences.chinese: 烦请下午与您的出价和跟踪记录了我。

sentences.english: Sorry for any inconvenience caused, your assistance will be highly appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢您的协助，如造成您的不便，烦请见谅。

sentences.english: We look forward to receiving your shipping advice, by fax, within the next seven days.
sentences.chinese: 烦请于七天内传真贵公司的装运通知。

sentences.english: Enclosed orders for you, please confirm receipt by return, and advise the expected delivery date. (ETD)
sentences.chinese: 附件订单，烦请确认收到，并回复交货期。

sentences.english: Please kindly check it otherwise we can't make this deduction.
sentences.chinese: 烦请检查它，否则我们不能使这个扣除。

definition: to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request
to inconvenience/to trouble (sb with a request)
to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/vexation/inconvenience
(polite) thank you for your trouble (used when asking a favor or after having received one)
private correspondence/personal letter/(computing) personal message (PM)/to message sb
to be generous (idiom)/to be magnanimous/Give me a break!
